pr_title: [2.19.x] DDF-5829: Added plugin support to map.view; fixed OpenLayers minZoom

timeline.bodyText:
This is sending cameraOptions.cesium unless cameraOptions is null, in which case it sends null?
Then when used in createMap, it is cameraOptions?  So cameraOptions.cesium is the type expected by createMap?
timeline.author: millerw8
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -188,11 +189,12 @@ module.exports = function CesiumMap(
   selectionInterface,
   notificationEl,
   componentElement,
-  mapModel
+  mapModel,
+  cameraOptions
 ) {
   let overlays = {}
   let shapes = []
-  const map = createMap(insertionElement)
+  const map = createMap(insertionElement, cameraOptions && cameraOptions.cesium)

timeline.message: [2.19.x] DDF-5829: Added plugin support to map.view; fixed OpenLayers minZoom
DDF-5829: Added extensibility for overriding all camera options.
DDF-5829: Added extensibility for overriding all camera options.
